SEARCH
Package com.paradegame.model

Class Parade

java.lang.Object
com.paradegame.model.Parade
public class Parade extends Object
Represents the parade in the Parade game. Players add a card to the end of the parade each turn. Cards in the parade might be collected based on game rules when a new card is added.

      public Parade()

  • Method Details

    • addCard

      public void addCard(Card card)
      Adds a card to the end of the parade.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to be added

    • handleCardPlayed

      public List<Card> handleCardPlayed(Card playedCard)
      Determines which cards must be removed from the parade when a card is played. This modifies the parade by removing certain cards that share the same colour as the played card or have a value less than or equal to it.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - the card being played
      Returns:
      the list of cards that are removed from the parade as a result of playing this card

    • simulateCollectedCards

      public List<Card> simulateCollectedCards(Card playedCard)
      Simulates playing a card in the parade without modifying the original parade. Creates a temporary parade to determine which cards would be collected.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - the card being played
      Returns:
      the list of cards that would be collected if the card were played

    • size

      public int size()
      Gets the number of cards currently in the parade.
      Returns:
      the number of cards in the parade

    • getCards

      public List<Card> getCards()
      Gets the list of cards currently in the parade.
      Returns:
      the list of cards in the parade

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the parade.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of the cards in the parade
